main event: USAF personnel observed a brilliant, circular-shaped light rising sharply from the sea in Cyprus on 10 May 1952.
interesting points: The object was described as luminous and moving at a very rapid rate of speed., There was no air traffic in the vicinity during the sighting., The object faded out of sight directly overhead after an initial wave motion., Multiple British servicemen were part of the observation group., The sighting took place in Paphos, a city in Southwestern Cyprus.
